item.description:
I've been to Six Flags Fright Fest, West Haven's Fright Haven, and, last year, Lake Compounce's Haunted Graveyard, and while they're all good, I think the Graveyard was the best. So we're going tonight!

Ride the rides, & see the haunted houses & the Haunted Graveyard (an outdoor trail).

Dare to go out in the dark near Halloween...with someone named "Jason"!

Join for graveyard alone ($20) or rides + graveyard ($28). Alexis & I are doing both.

Rides open at 5pm, it all closes tonight at 10pm. We're heading-up around 4pm. If anyone wants to meet to car-pool, let me know.

Forecast says some gusts, and temperatures 59 daytime, eventually 34 at night. Dress warmly!

HOST: Jason, 203-901-4957

DIRECTIONS: Click here
item.name: Sun 10/28-TONIGHT, world's greatest haunted house!
